resources.string: This portal will allow you to return to town. It seems quite unstable, it probably won\'t be active for too long.\nWould you like to use it?
This portal will take you back to the dungeon.\nWould you like to use it?
You haven\'t used portal on this level. After leaving you won\'t be able to use this portal again!\nAre you sure you want to leave?

Carvings on a surface of this portal is forming a peculiar pattern. It appears as if it\'s a giant tunnel leading into a distance. But looking at it from a side, it becomes obvious, that it\'s surface is almost flat.
The portal is oozing some sort of glowing matter. It looks perfectly still, if not for ripples coming from it\'s center.
You touched the portal and... nothing happened.
This portal will take to the first level of the %s.
